alert.note: Alert for Androscoggin; Central Interior Cumberland; Interior Cumberland Highlands; Southern Oxford (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 02 at 3:48PM EDT by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Oxford, southwestern Androscoggin and northwestern Cumberland Counties through 415 PM EDT... At 348 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles east of Bridgton, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Bridgton, Mechanic Falls, Naples, Hiram, Raymond, Casco, Harrison, Hebron, Denmark, Sebago, Otisfield, Oxford, Poland, Baldwin, Minot and Paris. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Androscoggin; Central Interior Cumberland; Interior Cumberland Highlands; Southern Oxford
